title: The implementation of customer focus principle based on ISO 9001; 2000 in PT XYZ: a case study approach
abstract: The essentials element o f the problem is that the implementation o f the customer-focus Principle based on ISO 9001:2000. The research approach that is being used is qualitative. The reason for this approach is that the research topic related with explanation about why PT XYZ has not implemented the customer focus Principle appropriately. The method used in this research is a single case study. The company has implemented ISO 9001:2000 and documents that needed in ISO 9001:2000, especially related with Customer Focus Principle, have been implemented by the company through Quality Policy, Quality Target, and others documents. It has accommodated the ways o f conducting the Customer Focus Principle such as Suggestion Cards, Complaint Reports, etc. However, in term of construction o f the tools to measure the customer satisfaction, they are inadequate. It will influence the result o f the purposes that the company wants to achieve from the questions, and the measurement tools o f the questions. PT XYZ should form a team marketing research subordinate that has responsibility to survey the market, control and manage the customer database, and analyze the result o f customer feedback. The company needs to implement some tools that can measure customer satisfaction in an integrated way.
